description: Explore the decentralized future and take control of your digital assets and identity. Connect your wallet to experience true ownership of the internet.
total_minted_description: Please connect your wallet to view minting totals on other networks. The default display is for the mainnet.
claim_address_description: This contract version only allows claiming tokens for your own account. Please connect the wallet of the receiving account.
alter_transfer_amount_min: Transfer amount cannot be less than 0
